channel.title: S3 on Sanchit's blog
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on Sanchit's blog

item.title: Amazon S3 Intelligent-Tiering Archive Instant Access tier 🎚️
item.description:
Amazon S3 Intelligent-Tiering: Archive Instant Access tier

What is Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3)?

  • Amazon S3 is one of the main building blocks of AWS. It’s advertised as" infinitely scaling" storage. It’s widely popular and deserves its section
  • S3 provides unlimited storage space and works on the pay-as-you-use model. Service rates get cheaper as the usage volume increases
  • Amazon S3 allows people to store objects (files) in “buckets” (directories). S3 resources, e.g., buckets and objects, are private by default

What are different storage classes?

item.title: Let's understand the tips to secure Amazon S3 buckets 🛡️
item.description:
AWS S3 Security

Introduction

  • Amazon S3 provides an optimal foundation because of its virtually unlimited scalability. You can seamlessly and non-disruptively increase storage from gigabytes to petabytes of content, paying only for what you use. Amazon S3 is designed to provide 99.999999999% durability.

  • It has scalable performance, ease-of-use features, and native encryption and access control capabilities. Amazon S3 integrates with a broad portfolio of AWS and third-party ISV data processing tools.
